member.name: T:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader
member.summary: Exposes functionality for loading native libraries and function pointers.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a native library by name and returns an operating system handle to it.
member.param: The name of the library to open.
member.returns: The operating system handle for the shared library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary(System.String[])
member.summary: Loads a native library by name and returns an operating system handle to it.
member.param: An ordered list of names. Each name is tried in turn, until the library is successfully loaded.
member.returns: The operating system handle for the shared library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary(System.String,NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver)
member.summary: Loads a native library by name and returns an operating system handle to it.
member.param: The name of the library to open.
The path resolver to use.
member.returns: The operating system handle for the shared library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.LoadNativeLibrary(System.String[],NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver)
member.summary: Loads a native library by name and returns an operating system handle to it.
member.param: An ordered list of names. Each name is tried in turn, until the library is successfully loaded.
The path resolver to use.
member.returns: The operating system handle for the shared library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.LoadFunctionPointer(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a function pointer out of the given library by name.
member.param: The operating system handle of the opened shared library.
The name of the exported function to load.
member.returns: A pointer to the loaded function.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.FreeNativeLibrary(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Frees the library represented by the given operating system handle.
member.param: The handle of the open shared library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.CoreLoadNativeLibrary(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a native library by name and returns an operating system handle to it.
member.param: The name of the library to open. This parameter must not be null or empty.
member.returns: The operating system handle for the shared library. If the library cannot be loaded, IntPtr.Zero should be returned.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.CoreFreeNativeLibrary(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Frees the library represented by the given operating system handle.
member.param: The handle of the open shared library. This must not be zero.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.CoreLoadFunctionPointer(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a function pointer out of the given library by name.
member.param: The operating system handle of the opened shared library. This must not be zero.
The name of the exported function to load. This must not be null or empty.
member.returns: A pointer to the loaded function.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader.GetPlatformDefaultLoader
member.summary: Returns a default library loader for the running operating system.
member.returns: A LibraryLoader suitable for loading libraries.

member.name: T:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary
member.summary: Represents a native shared library opened by the operating system. This type can be used to load native function pointers by name.

member.name: P:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.Handle
member.summary: The operating system handle of the loaded library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new NativeLibrary using the platform's default library loader.
member.param: The name of the library to load.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Constructs a new NativeLibrary using the platform's default library loader.
member.param: An ordered list of names to attempt to load.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.#ctor(System.String,NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader)
member.summary: Constructs a new NativeLibrary using the specified library loader.
member.param: The name of the library to load.
The loader used to open and close the library, and to load function pointers.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.#ctor(System.String[],NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader)
member.summary: Constructs a new NativeLibrary using the specified library loader.
member.param: An ordered list of names to attempt to load.
The loader used to open and close the library, and to load function pointers.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.#ctor(System.String,NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader,NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver)
member.summary: Constructs a new NativeLibrary using the specified library loader.
member.param: The name of the library to load.
The loader used to open and close the library, and to load function pointers.
The path resolver, used to identify possible load targets for the library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.#ctor(System.String[],NativeLibraryLoader.LibraryLoader,NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver)
member.summary: Constructs a new NativeLibrary using the specified library loader.
member.param: An ordered list of names to attempt to load.
The loader used to open and close the library, and to load function pointers.
The path resolver, used to identify possible load targets for the library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.LoadFunction``1(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a function whose signature matches the given delegate type's signature.
member.typeparam: The type of delegate to return.
member.param: The name of the native export.
member.returns: A delegate wrapping the native function.
member.exception: Thrown when no function with the given name is exported from the native library.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.LoadFunction(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a function pointer with the given name.
member.param: The name of the native export.
member.returns: A function pointer for the given name, or 0 if no function with that name exists.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.NativeLibrary.Dispose
member.summary: Frees the native library. Function pointers retrieved from this library will be void.

member.name: T:NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver
member.summary: Enumerates possible library load targets.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver.EnumeratePossibleLibraryLoadTargets(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an enumerator which yields possible library load targets, in priority order.
member.param: The name of the library to load.

member.name: P:NativeLibraryLoader.PathResolver.Default
member.summary: Gets a default path resolver.

member.name: T:NativeLibraryLoader.DefaultPathResolver
member.summary: Enumerates possible library load targets. This default implementation returns the following load targets: First: The library contained in the applications base folder. Second: The simple name, unchanged. Third: The library as resolved via the default DependencyContext, in the default nuget package cache folder.

member.name: M:NativeLibraryLoader.DefaultPathResolver.EnumeratePossibleLibraryLoadTargets(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an enumerator which yields possible library load targets, in priority order.
member.param: The name of the library to load.
